Question: Quantron AG CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Quantron AG

Product: Quantron CES 2024 Highlights

- Quantron QHM FCEV Heavy Truck with hydrogen fuel cell powered solution for long range transportation
- Quantron QLI FCEV with flexible body variants, 8.2 kg of hydrogen on board, and a range of up to 450 km
- Quantron QARGO 4 EV, an ideal vehicle for sustainable last-mile transport with a range of up to 230 km
- Quantron CIZARIS 12 EV, an all-electric city bus with a range of up to 370 km
- Joint venture with Goldstone Technologies for digital transaction platform and AI-driven software solutions
- White paper on the decarbonisation of the transport sector and the optimal mix between BEVs and FCEVs
- Quantron-as-a-Service offering 360° Zero Emission product & solution ecosystem for alternative drives integration
Summary_cn:
全向 AG

产品：全向 CES 2024 亮点

- 全向 QHM FCEV 重型卡车，采用氢燃料电池动力解决方案，用于长途运输
- 全向 QLI FCEV，具有灵活的车身变体，搭载 8.2 公斤的氢气，续航里程高达 450 公里
- 全向 QARGO 4 EV，是可持续的最后一公里运输的理想车辆，续航里程高达 230 公里
- 全向 CIZARIS 12 EV，一款全电动城市巴士，续航里程高达 370 公里
- 与高盛科技公司合作成立合资企业，开展数字交易平台和人工智能驱动的软件解决方案
- 发布关于运输行业脱碳和纯电动车和燃料电池车之间最佳组合的白皮书
- 全向作为一项服务，提供全方位零排放产品和解决方案生态系统，用于替代驱动系统整合
